description: This table contains rows for each medication administration responsibility assigned for an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RESPONSIBILITY_VALUE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the medication administration responsibility value set in an encounter that is valid for a given time range.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Administered


Staff


Self


Caregiver

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the encounter in which a medication administration responsibility value was set for a given time range.

columns.name: DOCUMENTING_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the UTC instant at which a medication administration responsibility value was set for a given time range.

columns.name: DOCUMENTING_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the user ID who documented a medication administration responsibility value for a given time range.

columns.name: START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the start instant for a medication administration responsibility value set on an encounter.

columns.name: END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the end instant for a medication administration responsibility value set on an encounter. If this is not set, then the responsibility does not have an end instant.

columns.name: MAPPED_RESPONSIBILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication's mapped administration responsibility for a given time in an encounter. The mapped responsibility is the value that exists in the responsibility mapping configuration at the time the custom responsibilty is set for the order.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RESPONSIBILITY_VALUE_C_NAME

columns.name: MED_ADMIN_RESP_UPDATE_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the event that saved a medication administration responsibility value set on an encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Assign Responsibility


Order Created


Copied Forward
